artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of a belt buckle on the left; in the center two women shown from the waist up in elaborate hats; on the right a woman in a white gown with a purple overgown, a pink fan, and a white hat with a wreath of pink flowers and green foliage and two whitish plumes
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Vingt-huitième Cahier, 20 Août 1788
